title: 2017 NA LCS Spring Finals Survival Guide
body: The end of Spring Playoffs will be wrapped up at the NA LCS Spring Finals weekend. At the end of the event, one team will be crowned split champions winning a sick trophy, a championship banner to be awarded at the start of Summer Split, and a ticket to the 2017 Mid-Season Invitational to represent North America. Don’t miss the final clash of the top four NA LCS teams on April 22-23 live from Vancouver, British Columbia:

replies.body: Any stroller restrictions? My daughter is going to be joining us, but she's heavy....

Hey neatfeet,

The PNE is a family friendly venue so I expect it will be OK. I will double secret verify and post when I get an answer.
Strollers are ok!
! Booyeah
tell her to lose weight
Do you know the exact prices for the merchandise available there?

Hey marvic,

Our merch team tells me that prices will fairly close to the online prices, with the changes being for currency conversion and taxes. I am working to get the exact list.
We just got all the prices from the Merch team and will be updating this guide later today.
Guide is update with prices.
Do all the merch prices include tax already?

hey TheRaydude388,

yes, tax is already included in the published prices.
alright cool thank you so much

"...these lines will be ganked by event staff and security."

Confirmed, the event staff and security are all junglers and they keep the announcers' area warded.
Plus: Cheat codes
buy wards pls
How much will the yasuo hoodie and the spring finals t shirt and if you guys manage to get the team jerseys how much will they be? Will there even be ones for the team who didnt make it such as CLG?

Hey epiccodtion,

We are working with our merch team to get those prices. Will publish them here and update the guide when we have them.

Hey,

Still no update on the hoodie or shirt. We will only have team jerseys for the 4 teams that are attending. We are looking at ways to expand that in the future.
prices on the jerseys are?

Jerseys are $80 CAD
We just got all the prices from the Merch team and will be updating this guide later today.
Will we get to see what Commemorative Spring Finals Tee and Yasuo Premium Hoodie online or is it just super secret and it can be only seen at the PNE Pacific Colosseum
Will Team Merch be available?
We will have a limited quantity of jerseys for each of the final 4 teams.
I was wondering, if me and my friends have tickets for the finals on Sunday, would it still be possible for us to come in on Saturday to get photos with TSM and C9?

Hey CrimsomKnight ,

Team photos are only available with a ticket, as it happens inside the Coliseum.
Ah, so if I don't have tickets to Saturday's game (I do have ones for Sunday), I won't be able to go for photos?
You can go for photos on Sunday, which will be with P1 and FLY.
Alright, thanks for the info!
Will we be able to get autographs from teams we get pictures with?
No, sorry.
no
My question is, will there be lanyards for sale!?
No lanyards for sale, though we have a limited number of lanyards that will be given away to ticket holders when they enter the PNE each day.
Not this time, sorry!
shouldnt the games be reversed? isnt c9 vs tsm on sunday not saturday

Saturday, April 22: Phoenix1 vs. FlyQuest - Best of 5 (3rd place match)
Sunday, April 23: Cloud9 vs. TSM - Best of 5 (Finals)
Coming from Kamloops with 3 friends to watch both days. Going to be amazing. Getting pictures with TSM is a dream. This is going to be a great weekend. TSM. TSM. TSM. TSM.
Is there any way possible to get autographs?
also, if I wanted to give a gift to one of the players, should I give it to a Rioter on the day the team is not playing?
Interesting question. I am checking into it.

If you have a gift or something you want to give to a team or player, please give to the Rioters working and they’ll deliver it to them inside the venue. All gifts are subject to security searches and cannot be on the prohibited items list.

Hey Rurucia,

Not as an official part of the event. Sorry.
Will I be able to purchase merchandise with a credit/debit card?

Hey Tuazon  ,

Heck yea you will!

For anyone who is taking a bus to the Coliseum:
From downtown, the 95 (SFU B-Line) will take you to Hastings and Renfrew, and then the Coliseum is a short walk to the north.
If you're taking SkyTrain partway, take the 16 (Arbutus) from either 29th Avenue (Expo Line) or Renfrew (Millenium Line), and as above get off at Hastings & Renfrew and walk north.
From the northeast, a combination of the 701 (Coquitlam Central Station), the 160 (Kootenay Loop) and the 95 (Burrard Station B-Line) will get you to Hastings & Renfrew. You can also hop on the Millenium Line at Coquitlam Central instead, but from experience, going the 160 is potentially faster, and all three buses are frequent. (Every 15 for the 701 and 160, and even more on the 95)
Fares are $2.75 CAD for the entire system (less if you're using a Compass card) on Saturday and Sunday, and includes unlimited transfers within 90 minutes.
If you're a visitor that's planning on getting around mainly by bus, you may also be interested in a [compass card.](http://www.compasscard.ca) At this point it would be safe to assume it's too late to order one to be sent out, though.
Any further information can be found on the [local transit authority website.](http://www.translink.ca)

It should also be noted that there is **no ridesharing** (Uber, Lyft, etc...) in Vancouver, so if you're looking at getting a ride from someone, it'll be by [taxi.](http://www.yellowcabonline.com/)

And for those driving in, all parking around the Coliseum and the PNE is *pay parking.* Depending on local awareness, you may or may not have residents offering their own driveways for a price. (This used to be a big practice back when the Canucks played at the Coliseum. Dunno if it's even legal for them now.)

For those staying in downtown Vancouver overnight, keep in mind that the Vancouver Sun Run is happening in the morning and that detours and delays could happen.
Will I have any issues going through security with a turban?
Nope, you'll be fine pieman!
When will tickets be on sale?

Hey axetnollim, 
Tix have been on sale and you can find more info here: [http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/2017-na-lcs-spring-finals-tickets](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/2017-na-lcs-spring-finals-tickets)
Hope we'll see you there!
